Address.label: Address
Address.value: 3 OVERLOOK POINT, LINCOLNSHIRE, Illinois, 60069, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Zebra Technologies is a leading provider of automatic identification and data capture technology to enterprises. Its solutions include barcode printers and scanners, mobile computers, and workflow optimization software. The firm primarily serves the retail, transportation logistics, manufacturing, and healthcare markets, designing custom solutions to improve efficiency at its customers.

value.name: Tom Bianculli
value.title: Chief Technology Officer & Senior Vice President
